name: AI Filmmaking

prereqs.text: (76-101 [] at least D) or (76-102 [] at least D) or ((76-106 [] at least D) and (76-107 [] at least D)) or ((76-106 [] at least D) and (76-108 [] at least D)) or ((76-107 [] at least D) and (76-108 [] at least D))

long_desc: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to AIdriven filmmaking, from script to final product, using readily available AI tools.

custom_fields.goals: By the end of this course, students will be able to effectively use AI tools in filmmaking, create their own AIgenerated media project with a strong narrative and developed visual style, understand the ethical and legal implications of AI in entertainment, and apply critical thinking to solve production challenges using cuttingedge technology.
custom_fields.key_topics: This course will cover AI-driven tools and workflows in filmmaking, from scriptwriting and visual content creation to sound design and video editing, while addressing ethical and legal considerations and culminating in a hands-on project where students create their own AI-generated film.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Students will be assessed through assignments, active participation, and a final AI-generated media project.
